name: ScoutNinjaJin
description:
Play as Scout Ninja Jin!

Follow the Rules of Scout Ninjas and abide by the rules of teleportation

Talk to villagers to uncover Scout Ninja Jin's recent dilemma! why was he falling from the sky??

  1. WASD to move
  2. Left Shift to run
  3. Left Ctrl to Crouch/Stealth
  4. Right Click to Teleport (TOP of Wells/BirdHouse/Buildings)
  5. Z to Interact
  6. X to Assassinate

a prequel for the game "Garrison Hero: uGu's Reversal". Check it out too!

more stories revolving our tragic heroes to come!

Happy GAMING!
